comment._content: How odd! His name is Odd Dahl, and he went adventuring with a Roald. I guess Roald and Dahl are common Norwegian names.

comment.author: 44578649@N00
comment._content: Seems an unusual name 'Odd' though I guess that isn't the case in Norway. Really clear photograph, looks like it could have been taken yesterday. His wife is very lovely and is stylishly dressed even on expedition.
